quoteText: Ookla reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to restrict, suspend or terminate your access to all or any part of the Services, including the discussion areas, at any time for any reason without prior notice or liability.
title: They may stop providing the service at any time

tosdr.tldr: Change, suspend, or discontinue all or any part of their services
